name: First Post!
content:
This is the first post after the completion of the initial stage of the blog. Users can land on the front page and explore each post on their own. Or if you are an admin you can create, edit, and delete posts form the blog.

I hope that the formatting works as intended, if not then it doesn't matter.

In the future I plan on coming back to this project to store the posts in a database, maybe using an online data storing tool like firebase. I would also like to make some more authentication for the admin page but that will be a big project since I don't quite have any clue how to do that, yet...
